verses.verse: How hast thou helped <WH5826> <WH8804> him that is without power <WH3581>? how savest <WH3467> <WH8689> thou the arm <WH2220> that hath no <WH3808> strength <WH5797> ?
How hast thou counselled <WH3289> <WH8804> him that hath no <WH3808> wisdom <WH2451>? and how hast thou plentifully <WH7230> declared <WH3045> <WH8689> the thing as it is <WH8454> ?
To whom hast thou uttered <WH5046> <WH8689> words <WH4405>? and whose spirit <WH5397> came <WH3318> <WH8804> from thee?
Dead <WH7496> things are formed <WH2342> <WH8787> from under the waters <WH4325>, and the inhabitants <WH7931> <WH8802> thereof.
SH'ol <WH7585> is naked <WH6174> before him, and destruction <WH11> hath no covering <WH3682>.
He stretcheth out <WH5186> <WH8802> the north <WH6828> over the empty place <WH8414>, and hangeth <WH8518> <WH8802> the earth <WH776> upon nothing <WH1099>.
He bindeth up <WH6887> <WH8802> the waters <WH4325> in his thick clouds <WH5645>; and the cloud <WH6051> is not rent <WH1234> <WH8738> under them.
He holdeth back <WH270> <WH8764> the face <WH6440> of his throne <WH3678>, and spreadeth <WH6576> <WH8768> his cloud <WH6051> upon it.
He hath compassed <WH2328> <WH8804> the waters <WH6440> <WH4325> with bounds <WH2706>, until the day <WH216> and night <WH2822> come to an end <WH8503>.
The pillars <WH5982> of heaven <WH8064> tremble <WH7322> <WH8787> and are astonished <WH8539> <WH8799> at his reproof <WH1606>.
He divideth <WH7280> <WH8804> the sea <WH3220> with his power <WH3581>, and by his understanding <WH8394> <WH8675> <WH8394> he smiteth <WH4272> <WH8804> through the proud <WH7293>.
By his spirit <WH7307> he hath garnished <WH8235> <WH8765> the heavens <WH8064>; his hand <WH3027> hath formed <WH2342> <WH8790> the crooked <WH1281> serpent <WH5175>.

Lo, these are parts <WH7098> of his ways <WH1870>: but how little <WH8102> a portion <WH1697> is heard <WH8085> <WH8738> of him? but the thunder <WH7482> of his power <WH1369> who can understand <WH995> <WH8709> ?
